thread.title: Obasanjo: Buhari has not disappointed me - ex-President
thread.title_full: Obasanjo: Buhari has not disappointed me - ex-President

author: Gbenga Bada
title: Obasanjo: Buhari has not disappointed me - ex-President
text: (Presidency) “You can come to whatever conclusion you want to. In my book I said, and that is not running him down; I said he is not strong on the economy and he is not. In fact, I also said he is not strong on foreign affairs, although he has somewhat improved on foreign affairs. “But in the areas we know he is strong, he is doing his best. He is doing his best in fighting insurgency; he is trying his best in trying to fight corruption. So where you are facing is entirely unto you. You may be facing east or west or north .”
